row.process:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off :CASE "UNIX"
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Host" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AR_AEHOST#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "AE Port" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AR_AEPORT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service User" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AR_USERNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AR_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:SET &UC4RB_AR_AGENTS# = "" :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PUB.VAR.PROVISIONING_AGENTS,,"TO_BE_REMOVED",1) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &UC4RB_AR_AGENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AR_AGENTS#, ",&KEY#") : DELETE_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PUB.VAR.PROVISIONING_AGENTS", &KEY# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:IF &UC4RB_AR_AGENTS# = "" : STOP NOMSG, 0, "None of Agent to be removed" :ENDIF
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PRV.STORE", "PROVISIONINGTOOL.JAR", C, N !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :DEFINE &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, string :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_AR_AEHOST#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_AR_AEPORT#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_AR_USERNAME#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_AR_PASSWORD#" ') ! :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&$SYS_LANGUAGE#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_AR_AGENTS#" ')
:SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# = "AgentRemove" ! Invoking java binary java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#provisioning-tool.jar" &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :CASE "UNIX" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDSWITCH
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** AGENT REMOVE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** AGENT REMOVE ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
